Blah! I keep forgetting about Shredder.

::Shredder::

Shredder exits the base, flying off once more toward the location of
the old Predacon base.



--- In nbwrpg@y..., Zardus@n... wrote:
> ::Shredder::
> 
> "Allright. Go report to Magmatron, he probaby wants to see you. I
need to
> get back to my assignment though. I'll see you later."
> 
> With that he walks out of the CR, heading for the exit of the base.
> 
> 
> On Tue, 1 May 2001, *Orchid* wrote:
> 
> > Mantella
> > 
> > 
> > (Mantella nods to Shredder, still looking at the wall.)
